I doesn't use them because nothing like them is necessary in 
any way.

I =
was going to forward this same link, but I see it
was already provided:

ht=
tp://people.csail.mit.edu/gregs/ll1-discuss-archive-html/msg01848.html


I =
found it to be the bste analysis of why choreography is
unnecessary.  Read =
it thoroughly.

The key line for me is:

"You *cannot* execute those steps =
in the wrong order so there is no need
to define a choreography for this AP=
I."
